chat_history.message:
Hello, My iPhone 12 Pro has the above problem: Delivery did not occur
Thank you for your help,

Hello!


The tracking status of this order has not changed in 4 business days and is now considered lost as per Back Market delivery policy. We have requested the Back Market certificate of non-receipt and picture of the customers ID to arrange a refund or a replacement.

 Once all the paperwork has been gathered we’ll let you know if the customer prefers a refund or a reshipment. The deadline is 24 hours from reception of the documents

If at any point the delivery begins to move again a refund will not be issued and the order is considered to be late.

Best regards,
Ricardo-Filipe - Back Market

Dear Backcare,

Kindly assist the customer in preparing a handwritten CND with the IMEI of the device and their ID. We will check with our logistics partner. In the meantime, please do not refund the customer. Thank you.

Regards,
JY

Dear Backcare,

Please disregard the previous message. The customer's parcel has been at a pickup point since 15/05. Please ask the customer to pick up their parcel or it will be returned to us. Thank you.

Address: 
ABED ABD ALHADY + ABED MHDI , 135 FRIEDBERGER STRASSE , AUGSBURG , 86163 , DE

Regards,
RK

Dear Backcare,

I sincerely apologise. My logistics partner has informed us that the parcel is indeed lost.

Please send us the relevant documents to open an investigation with the courier. 
- A handwritten CND with the IMEI included
- Customer's ID

Thank you.

Regards,
RK

Hello!


The parcel has not been successfully delivered yet and all the requirements for a refund as described by our lost parcel policy have been fulfilled. Any and all relevant paperwork has been attached to this message.

You can use the attached documents to investigate the matter with your delivery company



Please send a tracking link for a replacement within 24 hours or this order will be refunded



You can now blacklist the device.

Best regards,
Ricardo-Filipe - Back Market

Dear Backcare,

The CND is invalid because the IMEI is missing. Kindly add the IMEI 356688115371140 into the CND as well, take note that the IMEI has to be handwritten. Thank you for your cooperation.

Regards,
JY

Dear ecomobile



Regards,
Aysu from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

Thank you for submitting the relevant documents. We will continue the investigation with our logistics partner.

Regards,
JY

Dear Backcare,

We have updated our logistics partner regarding the issue and will update you accordingly 

Regards,
JH

Dear ecomobile

please sent a device to the customer.

Regards,
Aysu from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

We are still conducting our investigation with our logistics partner. We take note of the customer's request for another device. In the meantime, please do not refund the customer.

Regards,
JY

Dear Backcare,

We have processed the refund.

Regards,
KW
